CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 1-3 PSCs based on bulk - heterojunction ( BHJ ) architecture are of particular interests since high performance devices with power conversion efficiencies ( PCE ) exceed 8% can be achieved.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! The "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. Bulk - Heterojunction (BHJ)
2. Power Conversion Efficiencies (PCE)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, my apologies. Here are the updated "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. Bulk - Heterojunction (BHJ)

The mention of "Power Conversion Efficiencies" (PCE) is not a material name, but rather a property or characteristic of the materials being discussed.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the valid entity in the paragraph presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Bulk - Heterojunction (BHJ) |
